posts.post_title: FS: 1888-89 N173 Cabinet of Paul Radford (Brooklyn's) SGC 6 - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
For Sale: 1888-89 N173 Cabinet of Paul Radford (Brooklyn's) SGC 6 (highest graded). 

Price: SOLD!
Payment: PayPal or Venmo and Goods & Services payment is fine.

Please ask any questions before you commit to buy, and see scans for condition. I am happy to coin this or post/send any other photos once I get home today. 

I just made a very large (for me) and very unexpected hobby purchase so I'll be selling a few things in the coming days/weeks to soften hit to the wallet.:)
